name: 1T9 Technology Private Limited
description: Provider of automotive leasing services intended to offer convenient alternatives to purchasing personal vehicles. The company offers various installment plans where the buyer can purchase and return vehicles after a certain period of time by paying interest for the lease contract, enabling customers to have an affordable and flexible way of operating a two-wheeler.
one_liner: Provider of automotive leasing services intended to offer convenient alternatives to purchasing personal vehicles. The company offers various installment plans where the buyer can purchase and return vehicles after a certain period of time by paying interest for the lease contract, enabling customers to have an affordable and flexible way of operating a two-wheeler.
